deepl-translate.plugin.name: DeepL Translate
deepl-translate.settings.title: Settings
deepl-translate.settings.apiKey.hint: Enter your DeepL API key (Free or Pro)
deepl-translate.settings.autoTranslate.h: Automatically translate content when it's created or updated
deepl-translate.settings.ignoredFields.h: Select fields that should not be translated
Please ensure you have content types with i18n enabled
deepl-translate.home.title: DeepL Translate
deepl-translate.home.noContent.descripti: No content available for translation in this content type
deepl-translate.home.selectContent: Please select content and target language
deepl-translate.home.autoTranslationStat: Auto-translation can be configured in the Settings page for each content type
deepl-translate.home.description: This plugin automatically translates your content using DeepL API. Configure your API key and content type settings to get started.
